reasoning: Cutaneous mastocytosis (skin limited) represents the majority of mastocytosis cases. Prevalence estimated 1-11 per 100k with median around 7.5 per 100k population. Incidence estimated 2-3 per 100k per year based on diagnosis rates. Moderate geographic variation based on European and North American registry data.
source: Clinical registry data and case series from European hematology centers
